    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/623</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/623</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">El Nil dóna vida a Egipte...</string>
            <string language="en">The Nile is life to Egypt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Nil ist Leben nach Ägypten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Nil est la vie en Egypte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Nile é vida a Egipto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Nilo è vita nell'Egitto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο Νείλος είναι ζωή στην Αίγυπτο</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Miniunitat didàctica (MUD) interactiva amb tres apartats sobre la importància del riu Nil a l'Egipte antic: 
com a font de riquesa (per a l'agricultura, la pesca, la caça) 
mitjà de comunicació...
vertebrador del calendari i de les feines agrícoles. 
Conté activitats d'autoavaluació sobre la informació de la MUD.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive mini teaching unit (MUD) in three sections on the importance of the Nile for ancient Egypt as a source of wealth (for agriculture, fishing, hunting), a means of communication, basis of the calendar and agricultural work. It includes self-assessment activities on the information in the MUD.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">història antiga</string>
            <string language="en">ancient history</string>
            <string language="es">historia antigua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">història</string>
            <string language="en">history</string>
            <string language="es">historia</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive unterrichtende Minimaßeinheit 
(SCHLAMM) in drei Kapiteln auf dem Wert des Nils für altes Ägypten 
als Quelle von Fülle (für Landwirtschaft, Fischen, die Jagd), 
Kommunikationsmittel, Grundlage des Kalenders und Landarbeit. Er
schließt Selbstbewertung Aktivitäten auf den Informationen im 
SCHLAMM ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mini unité d'enseignement interactive (BOUE) dans
trois sections sur l'importance du Nil pour l'Egypte antique comme 
source de richesse (pour l'agriculture, la pêche, la chasse), moyens 
de communication, base du calendrier et travail agricole. Il 
inclut des activités de art de l'auto-portrait-assessment sur l'information dans la
BOUE.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando mini interativa (LAMA) em três 
seções na importância do Nile para Egipto antigo como uma fonte da 
riqueza (para a agricultura, a pesca, a caça), meios de uma 
comunicação, base do calendário e trabalho agricultural. 
Inclui atividades do self-assessment na informação na LAMA.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mini unità d'istruzione interattiva (FANGO) in 
tre sezioni su importanza del Nilo per l'Egitto antico come sorgente 
di ricchezza (per agricoltura, pesca, caccia), mezzi di 
comunicazione, base del calendario e lavoro agricolo. Include le
attività di valutazione di se stesso sulle informazioni nel FANGO.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογική μίνι μονάδα διδασκαλίας (ΛΑΣΠΗ) σε τρία 
τμήματα σημασίας του Νείλου για την αρχαία Αίγυπτο ως πηγή 
πλούτου (για τη γεωργία, αλιεία, κυνήγι), τρόπο επικοινωνίας, 
βάση του ημερολογίου και γεωργική εργασία. Περιλαμβάνει τις
δραστηριότητες αυτοαξιολόγησης στις πληροφορίες στη ΛΑΣΠΗ.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">alte Geschichte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschichte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">histoire antique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">histoire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">history antigo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">history</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">storia antica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">storia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αρχαία ιστορία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ιστορία</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
